title: Privacy Policy | Workhint
content:
﻿

Your privacy is important to us.

The Privacy Policy governs the manner in which "-" the collection, use, preservation and authorization of information collected by platform users - and this privacy policy applies to the platform and all services provided by.

Personal Information:

[Workhint] collects personally identifiable information from users in different ways, including but not limited to times of user visit to the platform, registration on the [Workhint] platform, filling out the application, questionnaire analysis form, and other activities, services, features or resources that may We offer it on our platform. Users may be asked to fully explain the name, email address, phone number, and credit card data.

- How long the Personal Information is stored depends on the form of information and the reason we store the data for. Within the time necessary to satisfy the objectives specified in this Privacy Notice, we will maintain your Personal Data, unless a longer retention duration is needed or approved by regulation.

Non-personally identifiable information:

[Workhint] collects some information about users wherever they interact with the platform. This information is not about personal identity, but may include the type of smartphone and technical information about the user's access to the platform, such as the company used to provide Internet service and other similar information.

How we use the information collected:

[Workhint] collects and uses personal information for users for the following purposes:

- Improving the quality of customer service.

 Our information helps us to easily respond to your customer service requests and support needs more effectively.

- To improve the platform.

  We continuously strive to improve the offers made through our platform or website according to the information and feedback we receive from you.

- Send emails periodically.

The e-mail address registered by users to process their request will only be used to send information and updates to them regarding their request. It may also be used to respond to inquiries, or other requests or questions. If the user decides to join our mailing list, they will receive email messages that may contain [Workhint] news, updates, and platform information. If at any time the user wishes to unsubscribe from receiving any future messages, we will provide detailed instructions on canceling the registration at the end of each email, or the user can contact us through the platform or our website.

How we protect your information:

We follow proper procedures and security standards in the collection, preservation and handling of data in order to protect such data against unauthorized dealing, modification, disclosure or destruction of your personal data, user name, password, and information about your transactions and data stored on our platform. Sensitive and private data between [Workhint] and its users is exchanged through secure communication channels and encrypted and protected through certified digital methods and methods.

Share profile:

We at [Workhint] do not sell, trade, or rent personal identification data of users to third parties. We may share aggregated demographic information that is not associated with any personally identifiable information about visitors and users with our partners, affiliates and advertisers for the purposes described above . We may use a third party service provider to assist us in running our business, as well as in the work of the platform or in the management of activities on our behalf, such as sending newsletters or surveys. We may share your data with this third party within the limits of those specific purposes if you have given us permission to do so.

Third party sites:

Users may find ads or other content on our platform with links to the sites and services of our partners, suppliers, advertisers, sponsors, licensors or other third party entities. You should know that we do not control the content or links that appear on those sites and are not responsible for the practices of the sites associated with our site. In addition, those sites or services, including content and links, may change constantly. These sites and services have their own privacy policies and customer service policies. Browsing and interacting on any other site, including sites linked to our platform, is subject to the terms and policies of those sites.

Changes to Privacy Policy:

[Workhint] has the discretion to update this privacy policy at any time. When we do so, the user should review the update date below this page, and we will send an email. We encourage users to review our Privacy Policy frequently to see any changes so that they know what we are doing to protect the personal data we collect. And acknowledge and agree with the User's responsibility to review this Privacy Policy periodically and to recognize the amendments.

Approval of Privacy Policy:

By using this platform, you agree to our Privacy Policy and the terms and conditions governing the use of this platform. If you do not agree with this policy, you should not use our platform. You acknowledge that your continued use of the Platform after posting changes to this Policy or the terms and conditions of use of the Platform will constitute your acceptance of such changes.

Payouts:

When you provide personal data in connection with the Payouts feature, Stripe receives that personal data and processes it in accordance with Stripe’s Privacy Policy.

to contact us:

If you have any questions about this privacy policy, the practices of this platform, or your dealings with the platform, you can contact us at: contact@workhint.com
